text: The Cowboys is a 1972 American western movie directed by Mark Rydell. It is based on the novel of the same name by William Dale Jennings. It stars John Wayne, Roscoe Lee Browne, Slim Pickens, Colleen Dewhurst, and Bruce Dern. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1972 movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Rydell
title: The Cowboys (1972 movie)
